name: Uncageable
description:
Prevents any items tagged BDSMRestraint from being equipped to the player's dick (by youself or NPCs). Usually refers to chastity cages but also applies to some modded items. Visually breaks some chastity enforced scenes.

Since certain NPCs can get spammy equipping these, the chastity items are not recovered.
The intent was to make this compatible with any mods (e.g. MoreBDSMstuff, Goo Bondage) present today and in the future, so equip-success messsages may still play during scenes or may show 'Error: No item found'.

Last update for 0.1.12fix4
Report issues to [url=https://github.com/ethengart/EGBDCCMods]https://github.com/ethengart/EGBDCCMods[/url]
author: EthenGart
